backend/main.mo: Actor defines user profile types, check-in data structures, and brutal feedback messages with authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Report linking dashboard graph removal feature to affected frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell configuring metadata, icons, and loading the main React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling auth flow, actor initialization, status loading, and routing to login, onboarding, or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendDial: Controlled dialog showing backend or fallback brutal feedback messages with close handling.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendFeed: Card that fetches and displays the latest brutal feedback with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/ChanceOfDrinking: Card showing a placeholder randomly generated risk level with color‑coded styling.
Computes days until Friday and the next full moon and displays themed messages in a card component.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckInDial: Dialog for daily sobriety, drink count, and mood input with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/DataLoggedDialog: Simple dialog showing a confirmation message after data is logged or updated.
frontend/src/components/DrinksChart.tsx: Builds a 14‑day drinks history bar chart with update animation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpCheckInD: Dialog for follow‑up check‑ins, asking if more drinks were had and optionally collecting a count.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Error boundary that displays an error screen with reload option and optional details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with branding and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/MoodIndicator.ts: Shows the most recent mood metric with an emoji and styled label.
frontend/src/components/MotivationButton: Button that fetches a motivation message, tracks remaining clicks, and opens a dialog to display the result.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Multi-step onboarding questionnaire that saves user profile data and auto-advances through predefined questions.
frontend/src/components/ProgressStats.ts: Displays sober days, streak, total tracked days, and drunk days using fetched progress metrics.
frontend/src/components/RepeatCheckInDia: Dialog for repeated daily check-ins that asks if the user is still sober or how many drinks they had.
frontend/src/components/SoberDaysSection: Shows sober streak and target progress with large visual counters.
frontend/src/components/StatusIndicators: Computes and displays status summaries for today, yesterday, and weekly average based on aggregated entries.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedHeaderSec: Header combining latest feedback display and a motivation button with rate limiting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status flags. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes a hook for consuming authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as onboarding status, user profiles, and check-ins, with retry logic and cache invalidation. Relies on an actor from useActor to call backend methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind and OKLCH-based BRUTAL theme styles, including colors, typography, neon effects, and utility classes. Defines base styling, dark mode variables, animations, and layout safeguards.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by creating the root, wiring QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App. Imports global CSS and initializes a QueryClient.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main logged-in dashboard, wiring identity, user data queries, check-in flows, and session logic into UI components. Coordinates auto-starting session flows and renders multiple metric and dialog components.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding, animations, and a button triggering Internet Identity login. Preloads the logo and shows a loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/session/dailySessionFlow.ts: Implements a deterministic session-flow state machine for onboarding and check-in modals, including phase resolution, modal queue generation, and state transitions.
frontend/src/utils/sobrietyDuration.ts: Parses human-readable sobriety duration text into a day count with simple pattern checks and a 30‑day fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, keyframes, and container settings with custom theme tokens.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current feature set, architecture, and state version for a React + Motoko sobriety tracking app.
